channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: The Blood Brothers, Young Machetes, V2

item.title: By: radiofreekevin
item.dc:creator: radiofreekevin
item.content:encoded:
“bi-polar-izing, shrill vocals”

“a commercial comb-over like MTV”

marvelous turns of phrase. still, they’re no match for “emo twat.” i’ll never forget logan’s reaction to seeing that we allowed those words to be published. it gave him a sense of his critical parameters, which, as we know, are pretty liberal. (remember the “happy ending” reference?)

spladow
